data.title: Nightfall (World Map I) by Scott Lee
data.meta_description: Stream Nightfall (World Map I) by Scott Lee on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2019-04-05T20:40:27Z

Summoner 20th Anniversary Album Trailer Summoner 20th Anniversary is a magical and nostalgic journey into a moment in gaming history for PlayStation 2 and PC. Over a four year period, Scott Lee, the original composer has modernized the entire production by meticulously and delicately rebuilding every song from scratch. Hear elements and sounds you couldnât hear before, truly experience how the soundtrack was intended to be. Unreleased songs that were written for Summoner from 1999 to 2001 era complete the musical storyline. This album is a must-have for any Summoner fan! * Reused original keyboard hardware from 1999 adding the perfect color accuracy faithful to the source material from Summoner. * Recorded using industry top of the line DSP gear @ 96K 24 bit sample rate masters. Every sound was re-recorded for superb quality. * Evaluated development notes, audio, midi, and design choices for Summoner from legacy media to maintain accuracy. * Completed the musical storytelling with Summoner songs written from 1999 that were intended to be in the game. * An enormous amount of time, love and effort was put into the final product, for the fans! ð¹ Artist Website: http://www.scottleeofficialwebsite.com ð§ Apple iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/summoner-20th-anniversary/1458911423 ð¿ CD Baby: https://store.cdbaby.com/cd/scottlee4 ð¨ Artwork: http://www.kellysnapka.com Please like ðð» and share ð» to help spread the word. Thank you! Copyright Â© 2019 Scott Lee. All rights reserved.
